access_token.description: The access token issued by the server.

id_token.description: Optional identity token, issued for the code and password grants. Not provided for client credentials grants.

refresh_token.description: Optional refresh token, which can be used to obtain new access tokens. Issued only for long-lived authorisations that permit it.

expires_in.description: The lifetime of the access token, in seconds.

scope.description: The scope of the access token.
